GET /api/topics/:topic_slug/articles: Returns all articles for the topic specified in :topic_slug
POST /api/topics/:topic_slug/articles: Posts a new article to the topic specified in :topic_slug (Post should send a JSON object with title, body and created_by keys - created_by will eventually be handled through the frontend component, for now it requires the user_id)
GET /api/articles/:article_id: Returns the article specified by article_id
PUT /api/articles/:article_id?vote=up/do: Increments the vote counter in the direction specified in the vote query for the article specified by article_id
GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments: Returns all comments attached to the article specified by article_id
POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments: Posts a comment to the article specified by article_id (Post should send a JSON object with body and created_by keys - created_by will eventually be handled through the frontend component, for now it requires the user_id)
PUT /api/comments/:comment_id: Increments the vote counter in the direction specified in the vote query for the comment specified by comment_id
DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id: Deletes the comment specified by comment_id
GET /api/username/:username: Returns the user specified by username
